item.title: Automation Engineer (financial district)
item.description:
Widgetbox (www.widgetbox.com) is a San Francisco-based start-up with the leading self-service web widget platform. Every day, we help millions of people express, connect, create, and inform using web widgets. Web widgets are mini, portable-applications that can be added to any web page and serve two important goals: 1) Add Dynamic Content to Your Site & 2) Reach New Users Across the Web.

We are the worlds leading distributed marketplace for web widgets with tens of millions of monthly viewers and thousands of developers and bloggers. Our mission is to provide easy-to-use, powerful, self-service tools that help web publishers realize the value and magic of widgets.

We're looking for a talented, energetic Automation Engineer to add to our team. We're a fast-moving dev team and the new addition will be able to have a large impact on the company and the product.

RESPONSIBILITIES
 Writing and maintaining Selenium testcases
 Writing and maintaining non-automated testplan
 Establish and report on Performance metrics
 Answer e-mail and forum user support issues and report on metrics
 Initiate and assist in scope and design of projects / features
 Other duties as required

REQUIREMENTS
 BS in Computer Science or similar OR 5+ years relevant experience
 Experience with Javascript, HTML, CSS, and Flash
 Experience in a production environment supporting a live site a plus
 Experience writing Selenium tests
 Interest in learning all layers of the application stack

About Widgetbox:
 Investors include Sequoia Capital and Hummer Winblad Venture Partners
 Small (<20), close-knit, and very experienced team
 Agile development practices
 Established 3 year old company
 Great SF location
 More info at http://www.widgetbox.com/info/inside-the-box/

Compensation:
 Competitive compensation and equity
 Full-time position
 All Widgetbox employees enjoy the following company benefits:
-Medical/Dental/Vision insurance
-15 days of paid vacation, not including company holidays
-401K enrollment
-Commuter checks or pre-tax transportation reimbursement options
-Flexible Spending account option
-Casual working environment with weekly company lunches and all

local candidates preferred / no sponsorship available
Send resume and cover to jobs@widgetbox.com
